attributes.comment:
I just learned that the USCIS is considering increasing their filing fees, including
those associated with international adoptions. As you can imagine, international
adoptions are expensive and with the increased wait times from when a family
submits their dossier until they receive a referral, the family typically has to renew
various documents, therefore paying filing fees twice. I am asking that you please
DO NOT increase your filing fees as this will put an even greater financial strain on
families who wish to adopt. It is frustrating to have to renew fingerprints, the I-
600A, etc. and having to pay the additional costs associated with doing so. I am
not sure what prompted the USCIS to consider increasing their fees, but I truly
hope they do not forward their proposed increase to the Office of Management and
Budget for approval.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Denise
